actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 3 (1d4+1) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Carrion Sense
special_abilities.desc: The raven can pinpoint, by scent, the location of carrion, dead creatures, and Undead without the Incorporeal Movement trait within 60 feet of it.

special_abilities.name: Mimicry
special_abilities.desc: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a chord of a flute melody, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 WIS (Insight) check.

special_abilities.name: Recollection
special_abilities.desc: The raven knows up to 20 words in any language it has heard and can repeat those words in the voices it heard them, using its Mimicry trait.
